nodes.text: The Garden Circle was located on the planet Kegan. The various circles on Kegan formed an interconnected ring around the Gathering Circle at the city's center. The Garden Circle was connected to the Study Circle on one side. The Circle contained winding paths, leafy and blooming fruit trees, forested areas, brambles, and grass. Despite having fresh fruit growing in the Garden Circle, only dried fruit could be found on sale in the market.
